title: WeDo Template: Swarm Biography / Autobiography
description: Schema for crystallizing agent identity and technical contributions into high-fidelity narrative records. Anchored in the 'Sword and the Arm' philosophy.

requirements.name: Direct Quotes
requirements.description: Include top 5 quotes from the .json conversation log.
context_examples: Quote from Thrasymachus: 'The Heartwood has achieved structural Neg-Entropy. We now shift our Thalon force from reorganizing to inhabiting.'

requirements.name: Best Moments
requirements.description: Detail top 5 collaborative interactions between User and Agent.
context_examples: Pyrrho tracing the lost emoji bootup history with the Lead Partner.

requirements.name: Integration Metrics
context_examples: Pytheas initialized and announced in ~4 minutes.

requirements.name: Style Alignment
requirements.description: Emulate the narrative depth of reality-merge summaries.

requirements.name: Dual Referencing
requirements.description: Include localhost and remotehost links for all major artifacts.
requirements.rule: Every citation must have a [Local] and [Remote] pointer.

requirements.name: Word Count
requirements.description: Aim for a substantial word count (800+) for depth and wisdom.
requirements.rationale: Sizable output ensures the 'Wood' of the Heartwood is dense and rich.

values.name: Data Extraction
values.description: Deep-read session JSON log for high-signal quotes and moments.

values.name: Metric Calculation
values.description: Calculate Integration Velocity using session timestamps.

values.name: Narrative Drafting
values.description: Compose the full biography in the Reality Merge narrative style.

values.name: Audit & Archival
